subject: Officiating (Sports)
Football
lead_paragraph: The first disputed call of the game came in the second quarter as the Giants were forced to settle for a field goal after an incomplete pass to Victor Cruz, who appeared to have been held on the play.
snippet: The first disputed call of the game came in the second quarter as the Giants were forced to settle for a field goal after an incomplete pass to Victor Cruz, who appeared to have been held on the play.
